price: Wantoonni samiileefi dachii keessa jiran Rabbiif sujuuda godhu. kan jaalataniifi kan jibban ta’anii, Gaaddidduuwwan isaaniis ganamaafi galgala keessatti.{1}
arabic: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَظِلَٰلُهُم بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ۩
footnotes: {1} bakka kanatti sujuuda tilaawaa (qaraatii qur'aanaa) sujuuduu barbaachisa. inni qur'aana keessa bakka 15 jira.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walillahi yasjudu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan waẓilāluhum bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli
